resources.string: Stop Ebola, in Africa! Pray the Lord to help us
you will receive some notification about tweets

For several months now, the media around the world tells us that Ebola. People are worried and lack of concrete information from that information is managed by the usual media. NoEbola then just meet this need by providing information in real time. Even as you have not opened NoEbola, you receive notifications every 5 minutes on the latest information. What makes NoEbola different from other applications? NoEbola recovers latest public Tweet with the hashtag Ebola (#Ebola) into a news timeline on Ebola. Users then have the posibility to share this information through SMS, Facebook, Google+, Gmail, Twitter.
